detail_desc: Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Off-the-shoulder top in a viscose weave with smocking at the top and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned, raw-edge cuffs and a rounded, raw-edge hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with lace details. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and long, wide sleeves with lace trims.
Small hoop earrings in rigid metal ball chain.
Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a collar, button placket and flap chest pockets. Seam with a drawstring and ties under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Running jacket in jersey with reflective details. Hood and a high collar for protection from the wind, a zip down the front with a chin guard and a chest pocket with a taped zip. Raglan sleeves for increased mobility and thumbholes. Unlined.
Pool shoes in imitation leather with a padded, rhinestone-covered foot strap, moulded insoles and patterned soles.
Short, fitted dress in a fine knit with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves and a frill trim in a contrasting colour around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a crisp weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Tulle skirt with appliqués and a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Fitted jersey top with a wide neckline and short sleeves.
Running gilet in fast-drying, breathable fabric with mesh sections, large reflective details and hook-and-loop fasteners in the sides.

5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim, straight legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red and white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 10 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Pyjamas in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Straight-cut top with short sleeves. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and gently tapered legs with cuffed hems.
Short dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a V-neck with decorative gathers at the front. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Wide blouse in woven fabric with dropped shoulders and short, flared, flounced sleeves.
Jumper a soft, loose knit with cable-knit and pointelle sections, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Non-wired bra in soft cotton jersey with lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Short, pleated circular skirt in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist and decorative drawstring. Unlined.
Short, fitted, halterneck dress in sturdy jersey with decorative buttons down the front.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Block-coloured cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Microfibre bra with a scalloped trim at the top and underwired padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short cardigan in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and tie-front fastening.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.

Chimi x H&M. Stay on trend whether you’re poolside or on the beach. These pool shoes have a padded foot strap with smooth leatherette on the outside and soft fabric on the inside. The soles are moulded to follow the contours of your feet and the underneath is patterned for a sturdy grip. Available in two stylish colours and supplied in a transparent drawstring bag. Height of soles 3 cm.
Semi-opaque control-top tights that shape the tummy and seat. 15 denier.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, a text print on one leg, a back pocket and roll-edge hems.

Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and a small welt coin pocket at the front. Side pockets, welt back pockets and slim legs with slim-fit hems.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Long shirt in soft viscose twill with decorative beads and studs at the top. Collar, buttons down the front, chest pockets and long sleeves with a tab and metal fastener. Rounded, raw-edge, frayed hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.

Calf-length dress in cotton poplin with short balloon sleeves that have pleats at the shoulders and elastication at the hems for added width. Visible zip at the back with an extra-long tab, and a slit at the back. Lined sleeves.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Leotard in soft jersey with long sleeves and a tulle skirt. Press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Plumeti-patterned blouse in an airy viscose weave with a small frill over the shoulders, a lace-trimmed collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top with decorative gathers, and long sleeves with a frill trim and a button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets, seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Tube scarf in a rib knit. Width 30 cm, circumference 125 cm.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. The zip has a chin guard. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of all-in-one suit is organic.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a draped front and back and a seam at the waist with a flare to the hem.
Dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist, gently flared skirt and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Straight-cut jacket in cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, front pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Sports jacket fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar, hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Reflective details. Slightly longer at the back.
Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening.

Shaping briefs in microfibre with a light shaping effect on the waist. High waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. Laser-cut edges around the legs for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.
Metal hoop earrings in different sizes, three with charms in various designs. Diameter 1-2 cm.
Narrow imitation leather belts in different designs with a metal buckle. Width 1.2 cm.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that tie at the back, lacing at the sides and a low-cut back.

Platform sandals in imitation suede with cork soles. Crossover straps at the front and an adjustable strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles. The polyester content of the imitation suede is partly recycled.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
T-shirt in slub jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Microfibre hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Cotton espadrilles with elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Cotton linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Platform boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Decorative welt seams and chunky soles. Platform front 4 cm, heel 5 cm.
Viscose jersey top with a deep neckline at the front and short cap sleeves.
Vest top in cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline, deep armholes with raw edges, and short slits in the sides.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and wide inner ribbing at the cuffs. Drawstring at the waist and patch front pockets with a flap and press-studs. Lined.
Knee socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a decorative satin bow at the top.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, pleats at the front, a zip fly and buttons, side pockets, fake back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Fitted, lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and extra long sleeves with thumbholes.
Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit knitted in soft organic cotton with buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch. Long raglan sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch cotton weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets and two inner pockets. Fastening with one button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Pyjamas with a T-shirt and short shorts in soft jersey. T-shirt with a round, ribbed neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and overlocked hems.
